question: How many Rakath in Juama Namaaz and regarding fajar sunnah.
answer:
QUESTION
How many rakath we have to pray in Jumma Namaaz in Hanafi. please also consider the case that here qutba immediatly starts after second adhaan. Do we have to pray fajar sunna even if we are sure that we will miss the fajar jamaath.
ANSWER


Share:
1. If a person comes late to join the congregation for Fajr Salaat and he
fears missing the Jamaat if he engages in performing the two Rakaats of
Sunnah before Fajr, then he should not perform the Fajr Sunnats. (Tahtawi
pg.245; Qadeemi)
2. In Jummu'ah Salaat, there are four Rakaats Sunnat-e-Muakkadah before and
after the two Rakaats of Jummu'ah Salaat. According to Imaam Abu Yusuf (RA),
there are six Rakaats after the Jummu'ah Salaat, four and two. (Ibid pg.213)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
